fileheader.author: Torsten Dreyer with a little help from DATCOM+
fileheader.description: Model for a PA34-200T Seneca II

switch.name: gear/unit[0]/actuator-pos-norm
switch.test: fcs/gear-switch == 0 gear/unit[0]/target-actuator-pos-norm lt 0.8 gear/unit[0]/target-actuator-pos-norm gt 0.1 velocities/ve-kts gt 125

function.name: aero/function/ground-effect-factor-lift
function.description: Change in lift due to ground effect factor.

function.name: aero/function/ground-effect-factor-drag
function.description: Change in drag due to ground effect

function.name: aero/function/velocity-induced-fps
function.description: velocity including the propulsion induced velocity.

function.name: aero/function/qbar-induced-psf
function.description: q bar including the propulsion induced velocity.

function.name: aero/coefficient/CLwbh
function.description: Lift due to alpha Increase in CL decreases Period and damping,Dutch Roll damping. CL is low for landing

function.name: aero/coefficient/CLDf
function.description: Delta_lift_due_to_flap_deflection

function.name: aero/coefficient/CLq
function.description: Basic Lift Coefficient due to pitch rate(per radian)

function.name: aero/coefficient/CLad
function.description: Basic Lift Coefficient due to AOA rate(per radian) Important contributor to Short-Period damping For low Cla, aircraft must land at high alpha

function.name: aero/coefficient/CLicew
function.description: Lift_decrease_due_to_ice_on_wing

function.name: aero/coefficient/CD
function.description: Basic Drag Coefficient Sense: Always positive. Main contributor to Phugoid damping: Greater Cd, Better damping

function.name: aero/coefficient/CDDf
function.description: Delta_drag_due_to_flap_deflection

function.name: aero/coefficient/CDi
function.description: AILERONS: Piper PA34-200T Seneca-II Aircraft Induced drag due to flap deflection

function.name: aero/coefficient/CDgear
function.description: Drag_due_to_landing_gear

function.name: aero/coefficient/CDcowl
function.description: Drag_due_to_cowl_flaps

function.name: aero/coefficient/CDicew
function.description: Drag_due_to_ice_on_wing

function.name: aero/coefficient/CDbeta
function.description: Drag_due_to_sideslip

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cyb
function.description: Side Force coefficient due to Sideslip(per radian) Contributes to damping of Dutch Roll mode

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cyp
function.description: Side Force Coefficient due to Roll Rate(per radian)

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cyr
function.description: Side Force due to Yaw Rate(DATCOM does not calculate) Effect is small

function.name: aero/coefficient/CyDr
function.description: Side Force due to rudder(DATCOM does not calculate)

function.name: aero/coefficient/CyDa
function.description: Side Force due to aileron(DATCOM does not calculate) Usually neglected

function.name: aero/coefficient/Clb
function.description: Roll Moment coefficient due to Beta(per radian) Decrease of Clb to small negative value improves Dutch Roll Damping High Positive value leads to excessive spiral instability

function.name: aero/coefficient/Clp
function.description: Roll Moment coefficient due to roll rate(per radian) Clp alone determines damping-in-roll characteristics

function.name: aero/coefficient/Clr
function.description: Roll Moment coefficient due to yaw rate(per radian) Considerable effect on Spiral mode. Large positive values leads to strong sprial instability.

function.name: aero/coefficient/ClDa
function.description: AILERONS: Piper PA34-200T Seneca-II Aircraft Roll moment coefficient due to aileron deflection

function.name: aero/coefficient/ClDr
function.description: Roll moment due to rudder(DATCOM does not calculate) Usually insignificant in dynamic stability considerations but is ued in autopilot work

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cmde
function.description: Pitch_moment_due_to_elevator_deflection

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cm_basic
function.description: Basic_Pitch_moment_coefficient

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cmq
function.description: Pitch moment coefficient due to pitch rate(per radian) Pitch Damping Derivative Very important to Short Period damping of oscillations.

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cmff
function.description: Delta_pitch_due_to_flap_deflection

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cmadot
function.description: Pitch moment coefficient due to AOA rate(per radian) Negitive Cmad increase Short Period damping

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnb
function.description: Yaw moment coefficient due to sideslip(per radian) Determines Dutch Roll and Spiral characteristics Prevents side-slip and yawing moments

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnr
function.description: Yaw Moment coefficient due to yaw rate(per radian) Main contributor to damping of Dutch Roll

function.name: aero/coefficient/CnDa
function.description: AILERONS: Piper PA34-200T Seneca-II Aircraft Yaw Moment coefficient due to plain flap aileron deflection

function.name: aero/coefficient/CnDr
function.description: Yaw Coefficient due to rudder(DATCOM does not calculate) High value for controllablity, low value for good dynamic stability
